sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './Header.css' import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'; import ShoppingCartIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ShoppingCart'; import { Link, Route } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useStateValue } from './StateProvider' import { auth } from './firebase'; function Header() { const [{basket, user}, dispatch ] = useStateValue(); const handleAuthencation = () => { if(user){ auth.signOut(); } } return (
Hello {user ? user.email : 'Guest'} {user ? 'Sign Out': 'Sign In'}
Returns & orders
Your Prime
{basket?.length }
) } export default Header
